title: The Cochlear Implant Debate
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Cochlear Implant Debate.

hook.text: A device that can restore hearing sounds like a miracle. Many deaf people call it cultural genocide.

buildup.text: Cochlear implants electrically stimulate the auditory nerve, providing a form of hearing.

punchline.text: Technology can give hearing. It can't answer whether deafness is a problem to solve.

quiz.question: Why do some Deaf people oppose cochlear implants?
options: They see it as undermining deaf identity and culture
